subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C., May 3 — In the wood-paneled locker room of the Quail Hollow Club, players were picking up laundry and dishing the dirt when the telephones began to ring.
snippet: CHARLOTTE, N.C., May 3 — In the wood-paneled locker room of the Quail Hollow Club, players were picking up laundry and dishing the dirt when the telephones began to ring.
